body: Ok I got temp banned for to many infractions. Today I got one infraction and got temp banned for a month! Avicus mods...
body_tagged: Ok I got temp banned for to many infractions. Today I got one infraction and got temp banned for a month! Avicus mods...
title: I'm absolutely done with Avicus Mods

replies.body: You have 17 previous infractions. I think you should be happy its a tempban and not a perm ban.
replies.body_tagged: You have 17 previous infractions. I think you should be happy its a tempban and not a perm ban.

replies.body:
That is what happens if you break the rules too many times.
You have 18 infractions, 16 of them gained in the past month...
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Well u know I got temp banned a week ago. No I got 1 infrac and got temp again!
replies.body_tagged: Well u know I got temp banned a week ago. No I got 1 infrac and got temp again!

replies.body: Ok, first. Many people get perm banned. Second: Dooz is kind to give you a temp ban.
replies.body_tagged: Ok, first. Many people get perm banned. Second: Dooz is kind to give you a temp ban.

replies.body:
It should be the other way around. 
Us Avicus Mods, are almost done with you. You have 2 pages of infractions and you say you're done with us? 
You should be thankful enough that you got temp-banned instead of banned permanently. 
Make sure that you know what you're doing before you post it on the forums with this attitude.

replies.body: Then you best not earn any more infractions...
replies.body_tagged: Then you best not earn any more infractions...

replies.body: You were temp banned again because right after your ban ended you came back on and broke the rules, we aren't just going to give you another page of free infractions until you are given another temp ban.
replies.body_tagged: You were temp banned again because right after your ban ended you came back on and broke the rules, we aren't just going to give you another page of free infractions until you are given another temp ban.

replies.body: Yes, I got 5 infractions more since they promoted some players to staff members. (I just had 1 :c)

replies.body:
This thread shouldn't be on the forums. If you fell that you shouldn't have been temp banned again please email support@avicus.net to appeal.

- Locking
